Material used.Description: HEK293 cells overexpressing wild-type or mutant SOD1 were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression of the p.G40S variant was reduced by 60% compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were conducted.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SOD1-expressing cells served as the positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as the negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for comparison between groups.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells expressing SOD1 variants were analyzed for protein localization.

Readout description.Result Description: The p.G40S variant showed increased cytoplasmic accumulation compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Two independent biological replicates were analyzed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SOD1-expressing cells served as the positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Untransfected HEK293 cells were used as the negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Chi-square test was used to compare localization patterns.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with siRNA targeting SOD1.

Readout description.Result Description: Knockdown of wild-type or mutant SOD1 showed similar reductions in protein levels.

Biological replicates.Description: Two independent biological replicates were conducted.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Non-targeting siRNA-transfected cells served as the positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Untransfected HEK293 cells were used as the negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used to compare knockdown efficiency between groups.
